content: He also has a different combo strike that often begins with a downward fist punch, followed by two large horizontal claw swipes that spin his body, and ends with him ripping his fist out of the ground in a rising swipe as he leaps backward with the momentum. Immobilize him before he can retreat if you want to retaliate.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Old_Rattle-Drum_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Old Rattle-Drum Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Battle - Mad Tiger'.
The content is as follows:
He also has a different combo strike that often begins with a downward fist punch, followed by two large horizontal claw swipes that spin his body, and ends with him ripping his fist out of the ground in a rising swipe as he leaps backward with the momentum. Immobilize him before he can retreat if you want to retaliate.
